qa_list.answer: The authors of this text are Yonatan Bisk, Ralf Brown, Jamie Callan, Justine Cassell, Mona Diab, Fernando Diaz, Scott Fahlman, Robert Frederking, Daniel Fried, and Anatole Gershman.
